Vamprah::

"If you don't have any question more why don't you call at you 
scientist or whatever he or she is" said Vamprah "Maybe I should 
start to repair my Optics before anything else"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
wrote:
> Vamprah::
> 
> "I started to give troubles at Darkfate since we arrived here... " 
> said Vamprah with a strangle smile in her face "If I'd strated to 
> give troubles before, Predacon council would have killed me... Just 
> Here my plans could have the chance to be sucesfull -But I 
failed... 
> I guess that he didn't kill me 'cause he need my skills... Or 
should 
> I say "he needed"?"
> 
>
